name: ⚧ Gender ID Symbol
description:
⧸ Style for http://www.mycandylove.com/ full list ↴ ⧸
This is just a simple little style - one of my friends said they really wanted this, so I made it.
* Case-sensitive
additional_info:
CHANGE LOG
02.18.2017 ~ Completely re-done due to site's recent update.
Sites Supported: ☑ http://www.amoursucre.com ☑ http://www.amordoce.com ☑ http://www.mycandylove.com ☑ http://www.sweetcrush.co.uk ☑ http://www.sweetamoris.de ☑ http://www.dolceflirt.it ☑ http://www.corazondemelon.es ☑ http://www.mijnzoeteliefde.nl ☑ http://www.sockerflirt.se ☑ http://www.flirttistoori.com ☑ http://www.sweetflirt.ro ☑ http://www.sladkiiflirt.ru/ ¡NEW! ☑ http://www.slodkiflirt.pl ☑ http://www.csabitasboljeles.hu ☑ http://www.askito-m.com ☑ http://www.minsodeflirt.dk ☑ http://www.sukkersotkjaerlighet.com
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://mycandylove.com/profil/AzuraDream"), regexp("https://userstyles.org/users/288311") {
/*                                             -------------------------------------------------- *
 * :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: *
 * :::                          " G E N D E R     I D     S Y M B O L "                       ::: *
 * :::                              --  C r i ◦ A z u ◦ D r e  --                             ::: *
 * :::                                                                                        ::: *
 * :::         ----------------------------  A U T H O R  ---------------------------         ::: *
 * :::                            http://pastebin.com/u/CriAzuDre/                            ::: *
 * :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: *
 * --------------------------------------------------

	Theme made for Beemoov's otome game MyCandyLove/AmourSucre/etc.

		VER 2.2   ﹤February 18, 2017―1:11am﹥

 * :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: *

    	CHANGE LOG:

		- ¡NEW! Completely re-done due to site's recent update.


    VER 2.1    ﹤October 18, 2016﹥

		- Changed setting options, those updating from ver2.0.1 will need to revisit the style page.

    VER 2.0.1  ﹤July 17, 2016﹥

		- Added support for sladkiiflirt.ru (Сладкий флирт).
		- New regex.
		- Minor Improvements.

    VER 1.3    ﹤April 7, 2016﹥

		- Support added for other sites.
		- Now able to insert your username more easily.
		- Re-organized coding for easier reading.

 * :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: *

	If you liked this style, please remember to leave a positive review.
	Or, if you encounter trouble feel free to report the issue to me
	and I will do my best to solve the problem as best I can!

	Thank you for your time!!

                                               -------------------------------------------------- */}
@-moz-document regexp("https?:\/\/((.*).)?(mycandylove|amoursucre|amordoce|sweetcrush|sweetamoris|dolceflirt|corazondemelon|mijnzoeteliefde|sockerflirt|flirttistoori|sweetflirt|sladkiiflirt|slodkiflirt|csabitasboljeles|askito-m|minsodeflirt|sukkersotkjaerlighet)(.*)\/profile\//*[[user]]*/.*") {
/* ↓----------------------[ /*[[user]]*/'s profile ]----------------------↓ */

img[src="image/profile/icon-female.png"], img[src="image/profile/icon-male.png"] {
    width: 0!IMPORTANT; height: 0!IMPORTANT; padding-left: 18px; padding-top: 18px;
    background: url("data:image/png;base64,") no-repeat!IMPORTANT;}

/* ↑----------------------[ /*[[user]]*/'s profile ]----------------------↑ */}
